extension.name: JL - Club Icons
extension.author: Carsten KÃ¼hn
extension.description: This Module shows club icons of a selected project in one or more rows

field.name: template
field.label: which template?
field.description: you can add a template by creating a new folder

field.name: max_width
field.label: max width for logo bar (integer)
field.description: as default logo bar uses 100% of available width, you can limit maximum width here

field.name: logotype
field.label: logo type
field.description: which logo do you want to use?

field.name: jcclubiconsglobalmaxwidth
field.label: global max width for the logos (integer)
field.description: as default logos use 100% of available width and might get too big if you do not have many teams, you can limit maximum width here

field.name: logo_widthdif
field.label: width difference for regular / hovered logo (integer)
field.description: 12 should do fine here, but you can try different value

field.name: iconsperrow
field.label: max icons per row (integer)
field.description: after max icons per row we make a new row... LOL

field.name: iconpos
field.label: Align for hovered icons
field.description: top: hover only to bottom, middle: hover to top and bottom, bottom: hover to top

field.name: teamlink
field.label: do you want to link icons?

field.name: newwindow
field.label: do you want to open new window for website link?
field.description: only has effect if you link to club's website

field.name: project_ids
field.label: project id
field.description: you should use only one by now... maybe later on we can use more with favteams...

field.name: usepfromcomponent
field.label: do you want to use current project if available?
field.description: projectid selected above can be overwritten if you show module on a joomleague page
